section.title: Scope
section.text: This document covers the Human Resources Complaints Process

section.title: Pre-requisites
section.text:
The organisation prefers employees to resolve complaints themselves. If the employee they want to complain about can be handled by them, they should first try:
1.	Pushing them into a Lava Lake
2.	Feeding them to the Lazer Sharks
3.	Locking them in one of our many underground storage facilities
If none of these approaches work, please use this process.

section.title: Scope
section.text:
In order to register a complaint, we need the following information:
1.	For each incident:
a.	The Date it occurred
b.	Who was present
c.	A description of the event
d.	A reference to the rule which violated the code of conduct
2.	Submit the email to hr-complaints@shmesla.com with the title “incident”
3.	Once this has been done, our team will follow up with you in a few years.
